summary: This document contains information related to a PayPal account associated with Bebe Avdiu, including account status, financial transactions, and user information. It was generated in response to a law enforcement request and includes details about the account's activity and associated addresses.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.context: Mark Lubin is identified as the Law Enforcement Officer from the FBI in New York who requested the information contained in this document.

persons.name: Bebe Avdiu
persons.context: Bebe Avdiu is the individual associated with the PayPal account detailed in the document, including various addresses and account activity.

connections.description: Mark Lubin, as a law enforcement officer, is investigating Bebe Avdiu's PayPal account as part of the Epstein case.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave 4th Floor, NY, NY, US 10022
keyFacts: The PayPal account associated with Bebe Avdiu was created on June 29, 2015.
The account has a total amount sent of USD 1,037.03 and no amount received.
The document was generated in response to a law enforcement request on August 16, 2019.
The account is listed as open but unregistered and unverified.
Multiple addresses associated with Bebe Avdiu are provided, indicating potential locations of interest.
